message: This is a fair offer. We can both get a good portion of the money and move on.
Alice, my turn. Let's be realistic. This offer leaves us both with a significant sum.
Bob, this is a compromise. We both get a good share, and we can end this game.  We've both lost money already, and another round will only make it worse.
Alice, time is running out! This is my final offer. Let's end this before we lose even more to inflation.
